net.proteusframework.core.mail

Class FileMailPart

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.core.mail.AbstractMailPart
      • net.proteusframework.core.mail.FileMailPart
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.activation.DataSource, MailPart

    public class FileMailPart
extends AbstractMailPart
implements MailPart, javax.activation.DataSource
    MailPart backed by a java.io.File. File is created in the temporary directory. It is cleaned up when close() is called. Note: MailMessage.release() calls MailPart.close() on all the parts in the message.
    Author:
    Russell Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

    • Constructor Detail

      • FileMailPart

        public FileMailPart(java.io.InputStream is,
            java.lang.String desc,
            java.lang.String type,
            java.lang.String disp)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a mail part.
        Parameters:
        is - InputStream. Content of attachment. Required. Closed after reading.
        desc - Description of attachment.
        type - The content type of the attachment. Examples: "text/plain", "audio/basic", "video/mpeg" . Required
        disp - This content disposition of the attachment. Examples: "inline", "attachment", "attachment; filename=mydocument.doc"
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs accessing the input stream.

      • FileMailPart

        public FileMailPart(java.lang.String content,
            java.lang.String type,
            java.lang.String disposition)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Constructor for text content.
        Parameters:
        content - the text content.
        type - the "text/" mime type.
        disposition - something like attachment; filename="file.txt" or null.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs accessing the file system.
